card_text: When a "D/D/D" monster of the below card type is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck to your field: You can activate the appropriate effect once per turn;$N●Fusion: Gain 1000 LP.$N●Synchro: Your opponent cannot target that Special Summoned monster with card effects.$N●Xyz: Banish 1 card from the field or the Graveyard.$N●Pendulum: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.$NOnce per turn, during your Standby Phase: Take 2000 damage.
